...ALMOST EVERY FUCKIN TANK,STORY,DOUJIN SOMEONE SHIT OUT TO THIS FUCKING SITE IS FUCKING NTRASH.WHAT THE FUCK IS WRONG WITH YOU PEOPLE? -- ANTI-NTRASH MOVEMENT --

@tori, I get what you mean, but for me it is the same as like a video game like call of duty. While call of duty has you gunning down and killing npc and other players, it is just a game. This is just a work of art and ntr is just a genre. If someone gets influenced by a genre in the wrong way, it can become a problem, but if one keeps it at just something they like to see every so often or something of interest, there shouldn't be too much wrong. It comes down to how smart someone is at using what they are presented with. I am curious to see if open relationships are considered cheating or having multiple spouses or lovers. If both parties involved are okay with it, is it wrong? It is like how when one goes to a store and orders something, the other person there expects payment. If the buyer is aghast at the prospect at paying and demands it for free, it is seen as wrong; you need to pay for what you go to buy. But what if both parties are okay with free? I also reached word limit.

@Gambino, I mean, for the most part yeah, that's true; most ntr has the female just in it for the dick. This does not include ntr that has mind control or rape, since the female isn't exactly asking to cheat; but,is being forced to.  In this case; though, it might be a little different. While this one isn't translated yet, if it is anything like the previous one Osawara did; then, Gudao is asking for them to have sex with other men. It doesn't seem like the servants are enjoying the sex with other men, not that there aren't times when they have their buttons pushed, but they seem more pleased with fulfilling Gudao's wish. I think it would be more akin to cuckolding. It's like pseudo-ntr. 

On a side note I love the comments in any doujin that isn't vanilla, always a party.
